title: Research Hub
subtitle: Central Asian AI/ML Research Community
description: Our goal is to gradually build a representative database of AI&ML researchers with ties to Central Asia, including those currently based abroad. This initiative aims to foster international collaborations, educational outreach, and global visibility for Central Asia in the AI/ML research ecosystem.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We want to create the DSML KZ Research Hub that connects AI/ML researchers with Central Asian roots, whether they're based in Almaty, Silicon Valley, or anywhere else in the world.

collaborations.title: International Collaborations
collaborations.description: Connect researchers across borders to foster groundbreaking partnerships and joint research projects

education.title: Educational Outreach
education.description: Expand access to AI/ML education and research opportunities throughout Central Asia

visibility.title: Global Visibility
visibility.description: Showcase Central Asian AI/ML research excellence on the international stage

branding.title: Local Personal Brand Development
branding.description: Help researchers maintain connections with Central Asia, increase recognition in the region, and discover new opportunities without losing their roots

join.title: Join the Movement
join.description: Whether you're a PhD student in Tashkent, a researcher at Google, or a professor in Bishkek - if you have ties to Central Asia, work in AI/ML, and have at least one or two scientific publications in AI, Optimization, Machine Learning, or related fields, then we kindly invite you to fill out the form below.

profile.title: Share Your Profile
profile.description: Help us build the database by sharing your research profile, interests, and background
benefits: Boost your visibility in Central Asia

spread.title: Spread the Word
spread.description: Know other researchers with Central Asian ties? Help us reach them!

learning.title: Community Learning
learning.description: While we build our researcher database, join our reading club sessions where we discuss cutting-edge AI/ML papers and share knowledge.

cta.title: Ready to Make History?
cta.description: Help us create the first comprehensive network of Central Asian AI/ML researchers worldwide
